member.name: T:InTheHand.Net.ObexWebRequest
member.summary: Provides an OBEX implementation of the class.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Net.ObexWebRequest.#ctor(System.Uri)
member.summary: Create a new Obex request with the specified .
member.remarks: Uri must use one of the following schemes - obex, obex-push, obex-ftp, obex-sync. The host name must be the device address in short hex, or dotted hex notation - not the default representation using the colon separator

member.name: M:InTheHand.Net.ObexWebRequest.GetRequestStream
member.summary: Gets a Stream object to use to write request data.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Net.ObexWebRequest.ReadFile(System.String)
member.summary: Reads the contents of the specified file to the request stream.
member.param: The filename (including the path) from which to read.
member.remarks: Provides an easy equivalent to manually writing the file contents to the request stream.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Net.ObexWebRequest.GetResponse
member.summary: Returns the OBEX server response.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexWebRequest.Method
member.summary: Gets or sets the method for the request.
member.remarks: For Object Exchange the method code is mapped to the equivalent HTTP style method. For example "PUT", "GET" etc. In this version only "PUT" is supported and is the default value.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexWebRequest.ContentType
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the Type OBEX header.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexWebRequest.ContentLength
member.summary:
Gets or sets the Length OBEX header.
New in v1.5.51015
member.remarks: This property is mandatory, if not set no data will be sent. If you use the helper method this value is automatically populated with the size of the file that was read.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexWebRequest.Proxy
member.summary: Not Supported - do not use, this will throw an exception.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexWebRequest.RequestUri
member.summary: Gets the original Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the request.
member.remarks: For an ObexPush request the URI will use the "obex://" prefix, followed by the numerical device id in hex format. The path section of the URI represents the remote filename of the pushed object. Subfolders are not supported. Some devices may only support specific object types e.g. V-Card.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Net.ObexTransport
member.summary: Supported network transports for Object Exchange.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.ObexTransport.IrDA
member.summary: Infrared (IrDA)

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.ObexTransport.Bluetooth
member.summary: Bluetooth

member.name: T:InTheHand.Net.ObexStatusCode
member.summary: Specifies the status codes returned for an Object Exchange (OBEX) operation.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.ObexStatusCode.Final
member.summary: Applied to another code to indicate this is the only response or final response in a series.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.ObexStatusCode.Continue
member.summary: Operation was successful, more data is expected.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.ObexStatusCode.Success
member.summary: Operation completed successfully.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.ObexStatusCode.Created
member.summary: File/Object was created.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames
member.summary: Specifies the media type information for an object.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames.Image
member.summary: Specifies the type of image data in an object.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames.Image.Gif
member.summary: Specifies that the image data is in Graphics Interchange Format (GIF).

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames.Image.Jpg
member.summary: Specifies that the image data is in Joint Photographic Experts Group (JPEG) format.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames.Text
member.summary: Specifies the type of text data in an object.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames.Text.Html
member.summary: Specifies that the data is in HTML format.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames.Text.Plain
member.summary: Specifies that the data is in plain text format.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames.Text.vCalendar
member.summary: Specifies that the data is in vCalendar format.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames.Text.vCard
member.summary: Specifies that the data is in vCard format.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames.Text.vMessage
member.summary: Specifies that the data is in vMsg format.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames.Text.vNote
member.summary: Specifies that the data is in vNote format.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames.Text.Xml
member.summary: Specifies that the data is in XML format.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames.ObjectExchange
member.summary: Specifies the type of Object Exchange specific data.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames.ObjectExchange.Capabilities
member.summary: Used to retrieve supported object types.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames.ObjectExchange.FolderListing
member.summary: Used to retrieve folder listing with OBEX FTP.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames.ObjectExchange.ObjectProfile
member.summary: Used to retrieve an object profile.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Net.ObexWebRequestCreate
member.summary: Used to create a new web request for obex uri scheme

member.name: T:InTheHand.Net.ObexListener
member.summary: Provides a simple, programmatically controlled OBEX protocol listener.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Net.ObexListener.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ObexListener class using the Bluetooth transport.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Net.ObexListener.#ctor(InTheHand.Net.ObexTransport)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ObexListener class specifiying the transport to use.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Net.ObexListener.Start
member.summary: Allows this instance to receive incoming requests.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Net.ObexListener.Stop
member.summary: Causes this instance to stop receiving incoming requests.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Net.ObexListener.Close
member.summary: Shuts down the ObexListener.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Net.ObexListener.GetContext
member.summary: Waits for an incoming request and returns when one is received.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexListener.IsListening
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the has been started.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Net.ObexWebResponse
member.summary: Provides an OBEX implementation of the class.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Net.ObexWebResponse.GetResponseStream
member.summary: Gets the stream used to read the body of the response from the server.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Net.ObexWebResponse.WriteFile(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the contents of the response to the specified file path.
member.param: The filename (including the path) from which to read.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Net.ObexWebResponse.Close
member.summary: Frees the resources held by the response.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexWebResponse.Headers
member.summary: Gets the headers associated with this response from the server.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexWebResponse.StatusCode
member.summary: Returns a status code to indicate the outcome of the request.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Net.ObexListenerContext
member.summary: Provides access to the request and response objects used by the class.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexListenerContext.Request
member.summary: Gets the that represents a client's request for a resource

member.name: T:InTheHand.Net.ObexUri
member.summary:
Contains helper functionality.
New in v1.5.51015

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.ObexUri.UriSchemeObex
member.summary: Specifies that the URI is accessed through the Object Exchange (OBEX) protocol.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.ObexUri.UriSchemeObexPush
member.summary: Specifies that the URI is accessed through the Object Exchange (OBEX) Push protocol.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.ObexUri.UriSchemeObexFtp
member.summary: Specifies that the URI is accessed through the Object Exchange (OBEX) FTP protocol.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.ObexUri.UriSchemeObexSync
member.summary: Specifies that the URI is accessed through the Object Exchange (OBEX) Sync protocol.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Net.ObexUri.UnescapeDataString(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to its unescaped representation.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Net.ObexMethod
member.summary: Methods which can be carried out in an Object Exchange transaction.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.ObexMethod.Put
member.summary: Sends an object to a receiving device.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.ObexMethod.Get
member.summary: Requests a file from the remote device.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.ObexMethod.Connect
member.summary: Negotiate an Object Exchange connection with a remote device.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.ObexMethod.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnect an existing Object Exchange session.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.ObexMethod.PutFinal
member.summary: Sends the last packet of an object to a receiving device.

member.name: F:InTheHand.Net.ObexMethod.SetPath
member.summary: Change remote path on an Object Exchange server.

member.name: T:InTheHand.Net.ObexListenerRequest
member.summary: Describes an incoming OBEX request to an object.

member.name: M:InTheHand.Net.ObexListenerRequest.WriteFile(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the body of the request to the specified file path.
member.param: The filename (including the path) to write to.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexListenerRequest.ContentLength64
member.summary:
Gets the length of the body data included in the request.
New in v1.5.51015
member.value: A long value that contains the value from the request's Length header. This value is -1 if the content length is not known.
member.remarks: The Length header expresses the length, in bytes, of the body data that accompanies the request.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexListenerRequest.ContentType
member.summary: Gets the MIME type of the body data included in the request.
member.value: A that contains the text of the request's Type header.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexListenerRequest.Headers
member.summary: Gets the collection of header name/value pairs sent in the request.
member.value: A that contains the OBEX headers included in the request.
member.remarks: For a complete list of request headers, see the enumeration.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexListenerRequest.LocalEndPoint
member.summary: Get the device address and service to which the request is directed.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexListenerRequest.ObexMethod
member.summary: Gets the method specified by the client.
member.remarks: Only PUT is supported in this version.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexListenerRequest.InputStream
member.summary: Gets a stream that contains the body data sent by the client.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexListenerRequest.ProtocolVersion
member.summary: Gets the OBEX version used by the requesting client

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexListenerRequest.RawUrl
member.summary: Gets the URL information (without the host and port) requested by the client.
member.value: A that contains the raw URL for this request.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexListenerRequest.RemoteEndPoint
member.summary: Gets the device address and service from which the request originated.

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexListenerRequest.UserHostAddress
member.summary:
Gets the server address to which the request is directed.
New in v1.5.51015

member.name: P:InTheHand.Net.ObexListenerRequest.Url
member.summary:
Gets the object requested by the client.
New in v1.5.51015
member.value: A object that identifies the resource requested by the client.
